alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 03 at 10:10PM EST until February 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The coldest wind chills are expected to continue into early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
